documentation.text:
This is the BkdEthCvx strategy, which is designed to be used by a Backd ETH Vault.
 The strategy holds ETH as it's underlying and allocates liquidity to Convex via given Curve Pool with 2 underlying tokens.
 Rewards received on Convex (CVX, CRV), are sold in part for the underlying.
 A share of earned CVX & CRV are retained on behalf of the Backd community to participate in governance.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer,uint256) view returns (address)
function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

@notice Returns the name of the strategy.
 @return The name of the strategy.
@dev Contract does not stash tokens.

@notice Swaps all balance of a token for WETH.
 @param token Address of the token to swap for WETH.
@notice Swaps all available WETH for underlying.
@notice Sends a share of the current balance of CRV and CVX to the Community Reserve.
@dev Get the balance of the underlying.
@dev Get the balance of the lp.
@dev Get the balance of the underlying staked in the Curve pool.

documentation.text:
@notice Gets the amount of underlying that would be received by selling the token.
 @return Underlying amount that would be received.

addRewardToken(address).details: These are tokens that are not the main assets of the strategy. For instance, temporary incentives.
addRewardToken(address).notice: Add a reward token to list of extra reward tokens.

params.token: Address of token to add to reward token list.

balance().details: This includes idle underlying, idle LP and LP deposited on Convex.
balance().notice: Get the total underlying balance of the strategy.

deposit().details: Liquidity is added to Curve Pool then Curve LP tokens are deposited 		into Convex and Convex LP tokens are staked for rewards by default.
deposit().notice: Deposit all available underlying into Convex pool.

harvest().details: Any underlying harvested is not redeposited by this method.
harvest().notice: Harvests reward tokens and sells these for the underlying.

harvestable().notice: Amount of rewards that can be harvested in the underlying.

returns._0: Estimated amount of underlying available to harvest.

name().notice: Returns the name of the strategy.

params.token: Address of token to remove from reward token list.

setCommunityReserve(address).details: CRV & CVX will be taxed and allocated to the reserve,      such that Backd can participate in governance.
setCommunityReserve(address).notice: Set the address of the communit reserve.

setCrvCommunityReserveShare(uint256).notice: Set the share of CRV to send to the Community Reserve.

params.crvCommunityReserveShare_: New fee charged on CRV rewards for governance.

setCvxCommunityReserveShare(uint256).notice: Set the share of CVX to send to the Community Reserve.

params.cvxCommunityReserveShare_: New fee charged on CVX rewards for governance.

setImbalanceToleranceIn(uint256).details: Stored as a percent, e.g. 1% would be set as 0.01
setImbalanceToleranceIn(uint256).notice: Set imbalance tolerance for Curve Pool deposits.

setImbalanceToleranceOut(uint256).details: Stored as a percent, e.g. 1% would be set as 0.01
setImbalanceToleranceOut(uint256).notice: Set imbalance tolerance for Curve Pool withdrawals.

setSlippageTolerance(uint256).details: Stored as a multiplier, e.g. 2% would be set as 0.98.
setSlippageTolerance(uint256).notice: Set slippage tolerance for reward token swaps.

setStrategist(address).details: Can only be set by current strategist.

shutdown().notice: Shuts down the strategy, disabling deposits.

returns._0: True if the strategy was succesfully shutdown

swapDex(address).details: Only SushiSwap and Uniswap are supported.
swapDex(address).notice: Set the DEX that should be used for swapping for a specific coin.         If Uniswap is active, it will switch to SushiSwap and vice versa.

params.token: Address of token for which the DEX should be updated.

withdraw(uint256).details: This can only be called by the vault.      If the amount is not available, it will be made liquid.
withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw an amount of underlying to the vault.

withdrawAll().details: This does not liquidate reward tokens and only considers      idle underlying, idle lp tokens and staked lp tokens.
